actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that any parent who kidnaps his or her minor child shall be fined not more than $1,000, or imprisoned for not more than one year, or both.

summary.text: Makes it unlawful for a parent to kidnap his or her minor child. Establishes a maximum penalty of $1,000 and/or one year imprisonment.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that any parent who kidnaps his or her minor child shall be fined not more than $1,000, or imprisoned for not more than one year, or both.
